item.title: VBA II: Stocks Data Webscrapping
item.description: Sheet with webscrapping capacity. Information is retrivied from Reuters Portal and then organized in sheets. Content in portuguese. Available at: Google Drive Objective: Create a sheet capable of colect internet stock data. Functionalities: Webscrapping stock data from diferent internet sources. Requirements: Proper Webscrapping function will require the instalation of SeleniumBasic for Excel and ChromeDriver compatible with Google Chrome version. You can find SeleniumBasic here and ChromeDriver here .
